v1.0.0.description:
Initial release of the Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago implementation.

Defend your lawn against hordes of undead in this Archipelago implementation of Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted!

- Find items by clearing levels, defeating Huge Waves or purchasing them from Crazy Dave.
- Items consist of plants and the game's various other unlocks (Shovel, Pool Cleaners, Roof Cleaners, Moustache Mode, etc.)
- Optionally lock Adventure Mode areas behind different access items: Night Access, Pool Access, Fog Access and Roof Access. After unlocking different areas, you can jump back and forth between them in whatever order you'd like.
- Choose which extra modes are included within the game. Mini-games, Puzzle, Survival, Cloudy Day and Bonus Levels (aka Limbo Page) are all supported.
- Optionally randomise the order of level unlocks within Mini-games, Puzzle and Survival modes.
- Traps: "Mower Deploy Trap", "Seed Packet Cooldown Trap" and "Zombie Ambush Trap".
- Randomise the music played during gameplay by level or by type.
- Complete your seed by defeating Dr. Zomboss at the end of Adventure Mode!

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
- Adds Universal Tracker support for randomised Mini-game, Puzzle and Survival level orders.
- Adjusts logic for Night and Survival levels to be more forgiving.
- Zombie Ambush Traps will no longer trigger during tutorial stages.
- Fixed an issue preventing items from being placed into start inventory.
- Fixed an issue preventing you from starting a level when playing one that banned certain seeds that you would have otherwise relied on to fill your seed slots.
- Made some changes that might address crash issues. Please let me know if it's made any difference at all!

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.1.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
- Prevents a crash caused by items with multiple classifications being placed in the shop.
- "It's Raining Seeds" now allows you to use any plant in the game, instead of only the ones you have unlocked.
- Made some changes to hopefully counteract the loading screen freeze bug. I have also implemented some extra logging to help me narrow down other potential causes. If your game freezes in the loading screen, please check the MelonLoader console window and send its contents to me!

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.2.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.0.2

v1.1.0.description:
- Adds an option to lock each Mini-game, Survival or Puzzle level behind individual level unlock items. For example, "Mini-game Unlock: ZomBotany" must be obtained before ZomBotany can be played.
- Adds an option where receiving an Adventure Mode area unlock item instantly unlocks all levels within that area.
- You can now access an in-game Archipelago text client from the main menu.
- Connection UI has been remade using in-game UI elements.
- Butter cannot be applied by Player 2 in Co-Op until the Shovel has been obtained. 
- Fixed an issue where the game would disconnect when viewing a page of the shop with fewer than 8 items in it.
- Hopefully prevented a soft lock some users were facing after beating a flag in Survival mode.
- Made some more changes that may help prevent loading screen crashes.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.1.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.1.0

v1.2.0.description:
- Adds deathlink support.
- Adds a new option allowing each individual Adventure Mode level to be unlocked as a separate item. For example, receiving the "Night Unlock: Level 2-5" item allows instant access to Level 2-5. This can lead to very varied playthroughs!
- Adds new options to customise your goal: `adventure_levels_goal`, `adventure_areas_goal`, `minigame_levels_goal`, `puzzle_levels_goal` and `survival_levels_goal`. More goal options are coming in a future update.
- Partially restored the end-of-level item drop and the ensuing award screen. These both are modified to reflect your AP item, but only show under certain circumstances for now. I plan to build upon this further in a future update.
- Adds an option to disable the storm flashes in "Fog: Level 4-10" and "Dark Stormy Night".
- Adds an option to place the Shovel into the first sphere.
- Prevents the game from automatically pausing when losing focus.
- Logic adjustments.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.2.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.2.0

v1.2.1.description:
- Fixed an issue that would lead to the Zen Garden tutorial activating when playing Roof: Level 5-5 in the same session that you started a fresh save file in.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.2.1.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.2.1

v1.3.0.description:
- **Adds Zombie randomisation!** If enabled, this randomly changes which Zombies are present in each Adventure Mode level. Gargantuars in 1-3? Sign me up! This is an early implementation of this feature. Provided this works well, more options related to this will be coming in a future update to expand upon it. Let me know how you get on with it!
- Adds new goal options: `cloudy_day_levels_goal`, `bonus_levels_goal` and `overall_levels_goal`.
- Adds a "View Goal" button to the title screen.
- Adds new options allowing you to individually adjust the unlock methods for Mini-game levels, Puzzle levels, Survival levels, Cloudy Day levels and Bonus Levels. 
- You can now randomise the order of Cloudy Day levels.
- Adds an option that, if enabled, allows Upgrade Plants to be placed without their base form. For example, Twin Sunflower can be placed directly onto the lawn without needing Sunflower. The Sun costs for these plants are also increased accordingly - no spamming 200 Sun Winter Melons!
- Adds in-game clear indicators to levels within Adventure Mode, Cloudy Day and Bonus Levels.
- Fixed an issue that would occur when playing Slot Machine with fewer than three plants unlocked.
- Fixed an issue causing Dr. Zomboss to sometimes not become available when he should.
- The level selector screen now more accurately remembers your most recently played level and focuses on it automatically when entering. If a new level has been received since then, the level selector screen will automatically focus on that instead.
- You are no longer forced to play Day: Level 1-1 as soon as a new game begins.
- Seed Packet Cooldown Traps will no longer activate in Beghouled or Beghouled Twist.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.3.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.3.0

v1.3.1.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.3.1

v1.3.1r2.description:
- Fixes Universal Tracker integration.
- Fixes an issue with version validation.
- Tries to fix an issue where users were sometimes brought back to Day: Level 1-1 unexpectedly. Let me know if you still run into this!

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.3.1r2.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.3.1

v1.3.2.description:
- Fixes an issue that caused players to be unexpectedly taken to Day: Level 1-1 (for real this time, hopefully).
- Fixes a logic issue where the game deemed levels incompletable, despite the fact they actually were quite easily doable. This never resulted in impossible seeds but it did make UT a bit misleading at times.
- Fixes an issue where the Sun costs for Upgrade Plants were mistakenly shown at their increased prices on the "Choose Your Seeds" screen, even if `easy_upgrade_plants` was disabled. This was only visual and did not affect gameplay.
- Fixes an issue where Survival mode clear checks were being sent out early.
- Fixes Upgrade Plants being chooseable by Imitater. This was unintended behaviour, but I'd like to bring it back in a future update when I can work the kinks out.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.3.2.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.3.2

v1.3.3.description:
- Fixes a logic issue that occured when the `cloudy_day_levels` option was set to `randomised_order`.

This update only affects the APWorld and does not have any changes to the mod alongside it.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.3.3.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.3.3

v1.4.0.description:
- **Introduces Seed Stat Randomisation!** If enabled, this randomises each Plant's Sun Cost, Packet Refresh Time, Toughness, Firing Rate and Projectile Damage. This aims to keep plants balanced while still providing plenty of variety. I would recommend you be careful with this setting for now until it gets further testing. If you choose to enable it, please let me know how you get on so that you can help me balance it further!
- Adds **Peashooter Zombie, Wallnut Zombie, Gatling Pea Zombie, Jalapeno Zombie, Squash Zombie, Tallnut Zombie, Giga Gargantuar and Trash Can Zombie** into Zombie randomisation.
- Adds the ⁨⁨⁨⁨⁨⁨`randomised_zombies`⁩⁩⁩⁩⁩⁩ option, allowing you to configure which Zombies will be included in Zombie randomisation.
- You can now choose to start the game with fewer than six seed slots. If you like, you can go all the way down to **a single seed slot**!
- Adds the ability to **automatically re-pick the same seeds you used in the previous level**. You can do this by pressing "R" on your keyboard, Triangle on controller (or the equivalent non-PlayStation icon) or pressing the new "Re-pick" icon that appears in the top right.
- The spoiler log now reveals randomised Zombie lists, randomised Plant stats and a theoretical loadout for each level.
- Adds a ⁨⁨⁨⁨⁨`goty_compatability_mode`⁩⁩⁩⁩⁩ toggle that forces your options to be compliant with the restrictions of Victor Tran's GOTY client.
- Adds option groups to the YAML.
- A partial logic rewrite. Logic should function mostly the same as before, but let me know if you encounter any oddities.
- Fixes a bug that could sometimes prevent controller users from switching Adventure Area.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.4.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.4.0

v1.4.1.description:
- If you have `easy_upgrade_plants` enabled alongside Seed Stat Randomisation, the in-game stat multiplier display will be based on the upgraded Sun cost.
- Fixes a bug where Seed Stat Randomisation would result in certain plants having 0 HP.
- Fixes a bug where entering ZomBotany or ZomBotany 2 could result in a freeze.
- Trash Can Zombie will no longer pop up in unexpected places. He can still appear in Adventure Mode with Zombie Randomisation (as intended) and will return to other modes in a future update.
- Fixes a bug where Seed Stat Randomisation could create values so high that it would crash the game. (lol)

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.4.1.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.4.1

v1.4.2.description:
- Fixes a bug where Seed Stat Randomisation made Torchwood break the game.
- You can no longer Re-pick plants you don't own after playing an Art Challenge level.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.4.2.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.4.2

v1.5.0.description:
- **Adds Conveyor Belt randomisation!** If enabled, this randomises the plants present on each Conveyor Belt level in the game across Adventure Mode, Mini-games and Bonus Levels. This is compatible with any combination of Zombie randomisation and Plant Stat randomisation.
- **Expands Zombie randomisation into other modes!** You can now randomise Zombies across Adventure Mode, Mini-games, Survival Mode, Cloudy Day and Bonus Levels! You are able to select which modes will be affected with the `zombie_randomised_modes` option.
- **Adds a `china_level` option, allowing you to incorporate the China level ("The Great Wall") into your run.** If enabled, the China level will count towards the "Total Levels" goal. As such, the "Total Levels" goal can now be set to 120 instead of 119!
- Adds `starting_sun_upgrades` and `maximum_sun_upgrade` options, allowing you to add "Additional Starting Sun" items to your game. These increase the amount of Sun that you will start a level with. You can choose for each upgrade to add 5 Sun, 25 Sun or 50 Sun each, to a maximum of 50-150 total additional Sun.
- Slightly buffed Trash Can Zombie. His speed now varies slightly based on his position, with him being faster at first then slowing down to slightly above his normal speed.
- You can now see randomised Plant stats during gameplay by hovering over a Seed Packet with your cusor or controller.
- Fixed an issue where controller users could not see randomised Plant stats during the "Choose Your Seeds" screen.
- Fixed an issue where randomised Plant stats would sometimes apply in places they aren't supposed to.
- Slight tweaks to the generation of randomised Plant stats.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.5.0.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.5.0

v1.5.1.description:
- Conveyor randomisation on "Little Zombie" levels is now guaranteed to provide at least one type of explosive plant.
- Balloon Zombie can no longer appear in Wall-nut Bowling levels.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.5.1.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.5.1

v1.5.2.description:
- If Bungee Zombie appears in Bobsled Bonanza, Pogo Party or Air Raid, then Umbrella Leaf will be logically expected before the level can be cleared.
- Giga Gargantuar can no longer appear in Bobsled Bonanza, Pogo Party or Air Raid.
- Zomboni can no longer appear in Roof: Level 5-5.
- Conveyor randomisation will no longer allow Spikeweed and Spikerock on Roof levels.
- Corrected the Sun cost of Spikerock when playing with `easy_upgrade_plants` enabled.
- Fixed a logic issue that could result in the game expecting you to beat Night levels without Sun producing plants. 
- Fixed the potential for `plant_stat_randomisation` to roll negative Sun costs.

This update only affects the APWorld. There are no changes to the client mod from v1.5.1.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/replanted_archipelago/blob/main/apworld/docs/setup.md)
v1.5.2.title: Plants vs. Zombies Replanted Archipelago v1.5.2
